description:
1. The end of the world is coming, if you can save only one kind of animal, which one will you pick?世界末日来了，如果你只能救一种动物的话，你会选……

a. Rabbit 兔子

b. Sheep 羊

c. Deer 鹿

d. Horse 马

2. If you had to be an animal which one would you choose?如果你必须要变成一种动物，你会选择变成……

a. Dog 狗

b. Cat 猫

c. Horse 马

d. Snake 蛇

3. If you have the power to make one species disappear forever, which one will that be?如果你有力量能让一种物种永远消失，你会选择……

a. Lion 狮子

b. Snake 蛇

c. Crocodile 鳄鱼

d. Shark 鲨鱼

4. If one of the following animals could speak which would you prefer it to be?如果以下的一种动物会讲话，你希望是……

a. Sheep 羊

b. Horse 马

c. Rabbit 兔子

d. Bird 鸟

5. On an isolated island you can only have one of the following as your companion, which one would you choose?在一个孤岛上，你只有选以下其一成为你的同伴，你会选择……

a. Human 人

b. Pig 猪

c. Cow 牛

d. Bird 鸟

6. If you had the ability to tame all animals, which would you prefer as a pet?如果你有能力驯养所有动物，你更愿意选择哪个成为你的宠物？

a. Dinosaur 恐龙

b. White tiger 白虎

c. Polar bear 北极熊

d. Leopard 美洲豹

7. If you could be an animal for five minutes which of the following would you prefer to be?如果你可以变成一种动物五分钟，你更愿意变成……

a. Lion 狮子

b. Cat 猫

c. Horse 马

d. Pigeon 企鹅

点击查看第二页

title: 动物选择题：测测你的恋爱观
